name: Jupiter's Clock
description:
GAMEPLAY EXAMPLES:

  • The button shows "0" --> click the central button.
  • The button shows "5" --> click the 5 o'clock  button on the Jupiter's Clock.

GAME LOSE:

  • MISS: Click the wrong corresponding hour.
  • ABORT: Time's Up!
  • STUCK: The central button can not be clicked anymore.

GAME WIN:

  • All the buttons turn purple color.
